channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Content Navigator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Content Navigator

item.title: CVE-2018-1364|2024-08-05T03:59:38.590Z -- ibm -- content%20navigator
item.description: IBM Content Navigator 2.0 and 3.0 is vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 137449.

item.title: CVE-2018-1366|2024-08-05T03:59:38.601Z -- ibm -- content%20navigator
item.description: IBM Content Navigator 2.0 and 3.0 is vulnerable to Comma Separated Value (CSV) Injection. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to exploit other vulnerabilities in spreadsheet software. IBM X-Force ID: 137452.

item.title: CVE-2018-1496|2024-08-05T03:59:39.076Z -- ibm -- content%20navigator
item.description: IBM Content Navigator 2.0.3, 3.0.0, 3.0.1, 3.0.2, and 3.0.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 141219.
